metadata.title: CVE-2019-9278 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In libexif, there is a possible out of bounds write due to an integeroverflow. This could lead to remote escalation of privilege in the mediacontent provider with no additional execution privileges needed. Userinteraction is needed for exploitation. Product: AndroidVersions:Android-10Android ID: A-112537774

criterions.comment: libexif: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
